A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>them,<s%> and behind <S%H3852>them,<s%> a flame <S%H3857>burns.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> is as the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>them,<s%> and behind <S%H8077>them,<s%> a desolate <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> <S%H6413>Yes,<s%> and no one has escaped them.

At their <S%H6440>presence<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are in <S%H2342>anguish.<s%> All <S%H6440>faces<s%> have <S%H6908>grown<s%> <S%H6289>pale.<s%>

They <S%H7323>run<s%> like mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%> They <S%H5927>climb<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> like <S%H4421>warriors.<s%> <S%H582><s%> They <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3212>march<s%> in his <S%H1870>line,<s%> and they <S%H5670>don't<s%> swerve off <S%H734>course.<s%>

They <S%H8264>rush<s%> on the <S%H5892>city.<s%> They <S%H7323>run<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall.<s%> They climb <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H1004>houses.<s%> They enter <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H2474>windows<s%> like <S%H1590>thieves.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quakes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8064>them.<s%> The heavens <S%H7493>tremble.<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> are <S%H6937>darkened,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> their <S%H5051>shining.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>thunders<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2428>army;<s%> for his <S%H4264>forces<s%> are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great;<s%> for he is <S%H6099>strong<s%> who <S%H6213>obeys<s%> his <S%H1697>command;<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>awesome,<s%> and who can endure <S%H3557>it?<s%>

"Yet even <S%H5002>now,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7725>"turn<s%> to me with all your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> and with <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and with <S%H4553>mourning.<s%>"

<S%H7167>Tear<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and not your <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> for he is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and <S%H5162>relents<s%> from sending <S%H7451>calamity.<s%>

Who <S%H3045>knows?<s%> He may <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H7725>relent,<s%> and <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H4503>him,<s%> even a meal offering and a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H8628>Blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> a <S%H6685>fast.<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly.<s%>

<S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%> <S%H6908>Assemble<s%> the <S%H2205>elders.<s%> <S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H5768>children,<s%> and those who <S%H3243>nurse<s%> from <S%H7699>breasts.<s%> Let the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from his <S%H2315>room,<s%> and the <S%H3618>bride<s%> out of her <S%H2646>room.<s%>

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for his <S%H776>land,<s%> And had <S%H2550>pity<s%> on his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559><s%> <S%H7971>"Behold,<s%> I will send you <S%H1715>grain,<s%> new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and you will be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H5414>them;<s%> and I will no more make you a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

But I will remove the <S%H6830>northern<s%> army far <S%H7368>away<s%> from <S%H5080>you,<s%> and will drive it into a <S%H6723>barren<s%> and <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> its <S%H6440>front<s%> into the <S%H6931>eastern<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and its <S%H5490>back<s%> into the <S%H314>western<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and its <S%H889>stench<s%> will come <S%H5927>up,<s%> and its bad <S%H6709>smell<s%> will <S%H5927>rise.<s%>" Surely he has <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things.<s%>
<S%H127>Land,<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid. Be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things.<s%>

<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid, you <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> for the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H1876>spring<s%> <S%H6086>up,<s%> for the tree <S%H5375>bears<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%> The fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> and the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H2428>strength.<s%>

You will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and there is no one <S%H5971>else;<s%> and my people will <S%H5769>never<s%> again be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>

"It will happen <S%H310>afterward,<s%> that I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> on all <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will <S%H5012>prophesy.<s%> Your old <S%H2205>men<s%> will <S%H2492>dream<s%> <S%H2472>dreams.<s%> Your young <S%H970>men<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2384>visions.<s%>
